definition: elderly man/father/father-in-law/neck feathers of a bird (old)
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
see 昂山素季[Ang2 Shan1 Su4 Ji4]

sentences.english: She is the daughter of General Aung San, a hero of Burmese independence.
sentences.chinese: 她是缅甸独立英雄翁山将军的女儿。

sentences.english: After Ms. Suu Kyi's party won, however, the election was annulled.
sentences.chinese: 在翁山苏姬的政党获得胜选后，选举却被宣告无效。

sentences.english: Suu Kyi has been detained for more than 14 of the past 20 years.
sentences.chinese: 翁山苏姬在过去20年已被军政权拘禁超过14年。

definition: Shuangxi or Shuanghsi township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
plain in the middle of the mountains/used in place names, esp. in 浙江[Zhe4 jiang1] and 福建[Fu2 jian4]
Dongshan county in Zhangzhou 漳州[Zhang1 zhou1], Fujian/Tungshan township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
former Tong'an county, now Tong'an district 同安區|同安区[Tong2 an1 qu1] of Xiamen city, Fujian
Jinxi county in Fuzhou 撫州|抚州, Jiangxi
Xikou or Hsikou township in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 xian4], west Taiwan
Chishan town in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
Wencheng county in Wenzhou 溫州|温州[Wen1 zhou1], Zhejiang
Qiantang River that loops around Hangzhou 杭州[Hang2 zhou1] in Zhejiang Province 浙江省[Zhe4 jiang1 Sheng3]
